availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Nelson (Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Tryphosa Mitchell. Father of Sarah Nelson, Hester Nelson, and Jessee Nelson. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, not stated, p. 249. Find A Grave, “Rev George Washington Nelson (October 25, 1825-August 7, 1886),” Memorial #75660012; https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=75660012 (accessed June 5, 2017).
